mapper.select: SELECT s.id, s.user_id, s.provider_id, s.token_id, s.pid, s.working_directory, s.command, s.type, s.status, s.start_time, s.last_activity, s.end_time, p.name AS provider_name FROM sessions s INNER JOIN providers p ON s.provider_id = p.id AND p.user_id = #{userId} WHERE s.id = #{sessionId}
SELECT * FROM sessions ORDER BY CASE status WHEN 'active' THEN 1 WHEN 'inactive' THEN 2 WHEN 'terminated' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, start_time DESC

SELECT s.id, s.user_id, s.provider_id, s.token_id, s.pid, s.working_directory, s.command, s.type, s.status, s.start_time, s.last_activity, s.end_time, p.name AS provider_name FROM sessions s INNER JOIN providers p ON s.provider_id = p.id AND p.user_id = #{userId} ORDER BY CASE s.status WHEN 'active' THEN 1 WHEN 'inactive' THEN 2 WHEN 'terminated' THEN 3 ELSE 4 END, s.start_time DESC

SELECT s.id, s.user_id, s.provider_id, s.token_id, s.pid, s.working_directory, s.command, s.type, s.status, s.start_time, s.last_activity, s.end_time, p.name AS provider_name FROM sessions s INNER JOIN providers p ON s.provider_id = p.id AND p.user_id = #{userId} WHERE s.status = 'active' ORDER BY s.last_activity DESC
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE status = #{status} ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE provider_id = #{providerId} ORDER BY start_time DESC
SELECT * FROM sessions WHERE status = 'active' ORDER BY last_activity DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO sessions (id, user_id, provider_id, token_id, pid, working_directory, command, type, status, start_time, last_activity, end_time) VALUES (#{id}, #{userId}, #{providerId}, #{tokenId}, #{pid}, #{workingDirectory}, #{command}, #{type}, #{status,typeHandler=com.llmctl.config.SessionStatusTypeHandler}, #{startTime}, #{lastActivity}, #{endTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE sessions SET provider_id = #{providerId}, token_id = #{tokenId}, pid = #{pid}, working_directory = #{workingDirectory}, command = #{command}, type = #{type}, status = #{status,typeHandler=com.llmctl.config.SessionStatusTypeHandler}, last_activity = #{lastActivity}, end_time = #{endTime} WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sessions SET status = #{status}, last_activity = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sessions SET last_activity = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sessions SET status = 'inactive', end_time = NOW(), last_activity = NOW() WHERE id = #{id}
UPDATE sessions SET status = 'active', start_time = NOW(), end_time = NULL, last_activity = NOW() WHERE id = #{id} AND status = 'inactive'
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM sessions WHERE status = 'terminated' AND end_time < #{beforeTime}
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions WHERE status = #{status}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM sessions WHERE provider_id = #{providerId}
mapper.update: UPDATE sessions SET status = 'inactive', last_activity = NOW() WHERE status = 'active'
UPDATE sessions SET status = 'inactive', last_activity = NOW() WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND status = 'active'
mapper.delete: DELETE s FROM sessions s INNER JOIN providers p ON s.provider_id = p.id WHERE p.user_id = #{userId} AND s.status = 'inactive'
